creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: three women create long white strands from carving a gourd at LL, one woman hangs the long white strands from strings tethered to vertical posts; another woman at UR hangs the white strands from a bamboo fence; a single, determined looking traveler cuts through the scene carrying bindle over PL shoulder; village buildings, bamboo trees, and mountains in background
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LRC, ULQ
title: Minakushi, from "53 Stations of the Tokaido Road"
